---
title: "Separate Training Data Times"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r, echo=TRUE}
#Load Library
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

#Read the CSV
df <- read.csv("C:\\Users\\msyag\\OneDrive\\Documents\\Intro to Data Science\\train.csv")

#Filter for 2013-2015
first_years <- df %>%
    filter(issue_d >= as.Date("2013-01-01") & issue_d <= as.Date("2015-12-31"))

#Save Filtered Data to CSV
write.csv(first_years, "data_2013_2015.csv", row.names = FALSE)

#Filter data for post-2015
post_data <- df %>%
  filter(issue_d >= as.Date("2016-01-01") & issue_d <= as.Date("2018-12-31"))

#Save Filtered Data to CSV
write.csv(post_data, "data_2016_2018.csv", row.names = FALSE)

```
